languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} marks a target, gaining +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against that target.
If the target attacks the Warrior during this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Warrior gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (once per round).
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Воин{/g} отмечает цель, получая +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} и +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}в ближнем бою{/g} с этой целью.
Если в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} цель атакует воина, он получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} (не более 1 за раунд).

traits.locale_text:
The Fighter marks a target, gaining <u>10+2×(TOU Bonus)%</u> to Armour and <u>2+(STR Bonus)</u> to Damage on melee attacks against it.
If the target attacks the Fighter during this round, the Fighter gains 1 AP (once per round).

The Fighter marks a target, gaining +<u>(10 + 2 × TGH bonus)</u>% armour and +<u>(2 + STR bonus)</u> damage on melee attacks against that target.
If the target attacks the Fighter during this round, the Fighter gains +1 AP (once per round).

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} marks a target, gaining +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against that target.
If the target attacks the Warrior during this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Warrior gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (once per round).

The Fighter marks a target, gaining +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}% {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} damage on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g} against that target.
If the target attacks the Fighter during this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Fighter gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (once per round).

If the target attacks the Warrior during this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Warrior gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (once per round).

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Воин{/g} отмечает цель, получая +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} и +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}в ближнем бою{/g} с этой целью.

languages.original_text:
The Fighter marks a target, gaining +<u>(10 + 2 × TGH bonus)</u>% armour and +<u>(2 + STR bonus)</u> damage on melee attacks against that target.
If the target attacks the Fighter during this round, the Fighter gains +1 AP (once per round).

traits.locale_text:
Боец отмечает цель, получая +<u>(10 + 2 × бонус ВЫН)</u>% к броне и +<u>(2 + бонус СИЛ)</u> к урону в ближнем бою с этой целью.
Если в этом раунде цель атакует бойца, он получит +1 ОД (не более 1 за раунд).

Боец отмечает цель, получая +<u>(10 + 2 × бонус ВЫН)</u>% к броне и +<u>(2 + бонус СИЛ)</u> к урону в ближнем бою с этой целью.
Если в этом раунде цель атакует бойца, он получит +1 ОД (не более 1 за раунд).

Боец отмечает цель, получая +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}% к броне и +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} к урону в ближнем бою с этой целью.
Если в этом раунде цель атакует бойца, он получит +1 ОД (не более 1 за раунд).

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}标记目标，被目标攻击时额外获得{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，对目标造成的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}额外造成{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
如果目标在本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中攻击战士，战士获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}（每轮只能触发一次）。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} marks a target, gaining +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against that target.
If the target attacks the Warrior during this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Warrior gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (once per round).

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}标记目标，被目标攻击时额外获得{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，对目标造成的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}额外造成{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
如果目标在本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中攻击战士，战士获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}（每轮只能触发一次）。

战士标记目标，被目标攻击时获得额外{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}%{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}，对目标造成的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}造成额外伤害，等同于{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}伤害。
如果目标在本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中攻击战士，战士获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}（每轮只能触发一次）。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}がターゲットをマークすると、その敵に対する{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}により{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+%{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}増加、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}増加する。
ターゲットがこの{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中にファイターを攻撃すると、ファイターの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が+1増加する（1ラウンドにつき1回）。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} marks a target, gaining +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against that target.
If the target attacks the Warrior during this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Warrior gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (once per round).

traits.locale_text:
ファイターがターゲットをマークすると、その敵に対する{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}により{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}が<u>(10+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>％増加、ダメージが<u>(2＋{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}ボーナス)</u>増加する。
ターゲットがこの{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中にファイターを攻撃すると、ファイターの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が1増加する（1ラウンドにつき1回）。

ファイターがターゲットをマークすると、その敵に対する{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}により{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}が{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}％増加、ダメージが{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}増加する。
ターゲットがこの{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中にファイターを攻撃すると、ファイターの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が1増加する（1ラウンドにつき1回）。

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} marca a un objetivo, ganando +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} en sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra él.
Si el objetivo ataca al guerrero en este {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el guerrero gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} (una vez por asalto).
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} marks a target, gaining +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against that target.
If the target attacks the Warrior during this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Warrior gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (once per round).

traits.locale_text:
El guerrero marca a un objetivo, ganando +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} y +<u>(2 + bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g})</u> de daño en sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra él.
Si el objetivo ataca al guerrero en este {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el guerrero gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} (una vez por ronda).

El guerrero marca a un objetivo, ganando +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} y +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} de daño en sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra él.
Si el objetivo ataca al guerrero en este {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el guerrero gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} (una vez por ronda).

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} markiert ein Ziel und erhält +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} gegen dieses Ziel.
Greift das Ziel den Krieger während dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} an, erhält der Krieger (einmal pro Runde) +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} marks a target, gaining +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against that target.
If the target attacks the Warrior during this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Warrior gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (once per round).

traits.locale_text:
Der Kämpfer markiert ein Ziel und erhält +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} und +<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ-{/g}Bonus)</u> Schaden auf {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} gegen dieses Ziel.
Wenn das Ziel den Kämpfer während dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} angreift, erhält der Kämpfer +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (einmal pro Runde).

Der Kämpfer markiert ein Ziel und erhält +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}% {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} und +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} Schaden auf {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} gegen dieses Ziel.
Wenn das Ziel den Kämpfer während dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} angreift, erhält der Kämpfer +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (einmal pro Runde).

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g} désigne une cible, ce qui lui permet de bénéficier de +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et de +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} lors des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} contre cette cible.
Si la cible attaque le guerrier lors de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il bénéficie de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} (une fois par round).
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} marks a target, gaining +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against that target.
If the target attacks the Warrior during this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Warrior gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (once per round).

traits.locale_text:
Le Combattant désigne une cible, ce qui lui permet de bénéficier de +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g})</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} et de +<u>(2 + bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g})</u> points de dégâts lors des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g} contre cette cible.
Si la cible attaque le Combattant lors de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, ce Combattant bénéficie de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} (une fois par round).

Le Combattant désigne une cible, ce qui lui permet de bénéficier de +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} et de +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} points de dégâts lors des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g} contre cette cible.
Si la cible attaque le Combattant lors de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, ce Combattant bénéficie de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} (une fois par round).

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçı{/g}, bir hedefi işaretler ve +%{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} kazanır ve o hedefe karşı yaptığı {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırılarının{/g} vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} da +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} artar.
Hedef, o {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} Savaşçı'ya saldırırsa Savaşçı +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} kazanır (her rauntta bir kez).
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} marks a target, gaining +{uip|BonusArmour|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|4696f02da13b4596b941bb950d945a05} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against that target.
If the target attacks the Warrior during this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Warrior gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (once per round).
